name: d3fine
description: React app made to allow users to create personality assessments. Full CRUD / Firebase Authentication.

name: Zen Portal
description: Zen Portal is a lite meditation app created with react-native-expo. This app is allows users to enjoy high-resolution audio/visuals while timing their meditation sessions.

name: Stop Jockin
description: Stop Jockin is a platform for New Orleans local business owner , 'Joc' , used to display many of his business ventures! This app was created with React, utilizing Tailwind css for styling.

name: Tara Fit
description: Tarafit.net is a mobile-focused app created for personal trainer Tara Farquhar. This frontend was developed with Next.js, and features a custom CMS interface for blog posting (handled by MongoDB and Payload CMS).

name: SVGeezy
description: Svgeezy is a Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG) gallery created through an Angular Framework. The goal for this app is to amass a collection of SVG images with direct svg pathing for devs to use for their projects.

name: ShipvsShip
description: Topdown player vs player space shooter made with GML. Controls: Player1- WSAD for movement, R for primary fire and space for secondary. Player2- Directional Keys for movement, primary fire with M.
